Description: We are seeking a Senior Interior Architect with a Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or Architecture and 4-6 years of industry experience. In this role, you will be responsible for managing the entire design process, from concept to project delivery, utilizing software tools such as Autocad, Sketchup, Enscape, V-ray, and Lumion. Your duties will include developing and refining design concepts, addressing contractor inquiries, attending client meetings, and providing guidance to junior architects. If you are a skilled and experienced professional ready to take on challenging design projects, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our commitment to exceptional design.Skills
Skills:
Project Management: Oversee the entire design process, from initial ideation to project completion, utilizing necessary design software tools.
Concept Development: Create, develop, and refine design concepts and drawings in alignment with client specifications and feedback.
Onsite Support: Address and resolve contractor inquiries during ongoing projects, including the review and approval of shop drawings.
Client Collaboration: Attend client meetings to comprehensively discuss project deliverables and requirements, ensuring client satisfaction.
Team Leadership: Supervise and mentor junior architects, providing guidance and support throughout project execution.

Education: A Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or Architecture is required.
Experience: 4 to 6 years of relevant experience in Interior Design or within an architectural design firm is essential.
Software Proficiency: Demonstrating high proficiency in software tools including Autocad, Sketchup, Enscape, V-ray, and Lumion is a must.
Design Background: Proven experience in designing both residential and corporate spaces is required.
Bonus Skill: While not mandatory, previous experience in landscape design is considered a plus.
Project Coordination: Ability to effectively coordinate projects with stakeholders such as structural, electrical, and mechanical engineers.
Materials and Construction Knowledge: A strong understanding of materials and construction details is expected.
AutoCad Expertise: Proficiency in producing detailed design drawings using AutoCad.
Adobe Photoshop: Basic knowledge in Adobe Photoshop is preferable.
Kindly upload your CV and Porfolio when applying.
